◆ is_applicable()

virtual bool planning::Planner::is_applicable ( const MotionCommand &  command) const
pure virtual

Whether or not this command can be planned by this planner.

Implemented by PlannerForCommandType<T>

Parameters
commandThe command to check.
Returns
Whether or not this planner can plan that type of command.

Implemented in planning::PlannerForCommandType< CommandType >, planning::PlannerForCommandType< PathTargetCommand >, planning::PlannerForCommandType< planning::LineKickCommand >, planning::PlannerForCommandType< InterceptCommand >, planning::PlannerForCommandType< CollectCommand >, planning::PlannerForCommandType< PivotCommand >, planning::PlannerForCommandType< SettleCommand >, and planning::EscapeObstaclesPathPlanner.

◆ name()

std::string planning::Planner::name ( ) const
inline

Get a user-readable name for this planner.

◆ plan()

virtual Trajectory planning::Planner::plan ( const PlanRequest &  request)
pure virtual

Plan a trajectory for this request. This is guaranteed to be a request that this planner is able to handle (according to is_applicable)

Parameters
requestThe request to plan.
Returns
A trajectory for the robot to follow.

Implemented in planning::PathTargetPlanner, planning::InterceptPlanner, planning::PivotPathPlanner, planning::EscapeObstaclesPathPlanner, planning::CollectPlanner, planning::SettlePlanner, and planning::LineKickPlanner.

◆ reset()

virtual void planning::Planner::reset ( )
inlinevirtual

Reset this planner. Called after the planner is not used to handle a given command for the robot.

Reimplemented in planning::EscapeObstaclesPathPlanner, planning::CollectPlanner, planning::SettlePlanner, planning::LineKickPlanner, planning::PathTargetPlanner, and planning::PivotPathPlanner.
